title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When the user has selected an item and uses the Ctrl+M (Add Import) command, nothing happens if there is trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: Add Import should be able to handle and ignore any leading/trailing whitespace within the selection and perform the import action as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Select an item with trailing whitespace.
2. Use the Ctrl+M (Add Import) command.
3. Observe that nothing happens.
